episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and intriguing topics, including an angry robot used for training telemarketers, the prevalence of eating meals in cars in America, the surprising dangers faced by hairdressers, and a riot caused by Elvis Presley inviting fans backstage.

facts.fact: A New Zealand firm has developed an irrationally angry robot to train telesales staff.
A fifth of America's meals are eaten in cars.
The most dangerous job in Britain is that of a hairdresser.
Elvis Presley once started a riot at the end of his show by saying to the crowd, 'Girls, I'll see you all backstage.'
